Uses of Class
org.kiji.mapreduce.KijiMapper

Packages that use KijiMapper
org.kiji.mapreduce KijiMR utilities. 
org.kiji.mapreduce.bulkimport Bulk importer classes for KijiMR clients. 
org.kiji.mapreduce.bulkimport.impl Internal classes for KijiMR bulk importers. 
org.kiji.mapreduce.framework Framework-level classes supporting basic KijiMR classes. 
org.kiji.mapreduce.gather Gatherer classes for KijiMR clients. 
org.kiji.mapreduce.gather.impl Kiji gatherer implementation details. 
org.kiji.mapreduce.impl Internal implementation details for KijiMR's top level classes. 
org.kiji.mapreduce.produce Producer classes for KijiMR clients. 
org.kiji.mapreduce.produce.impl Kiji producer implementation details.
